seoDescriptionBySiteType.RESTORATION: This is my test for source!!!!!!!!!!!
seoDescriptionBySiteType.AREA_OF_INTEREST: {{siteName}} is an area of interest in {{country}}.

seoDescriptionAppendix: Explore all info about this project on Restor.

addToCollection.title: Add site to collection
addToCollection.text: Select the collections in which you want this site to appear.

makeSitePublic.paragraph1: This is site is set on private and can’t be part of a collection.
makeSitePublic.paragraph2: Would you like to make this site public?

feedback.error: Failed to make site public. Please try again later.

userHasNoCollections.description: You don’t have any collections yet.

delete.label: Delete site
delete.text: Warning: Deleting this site means that all connections with organizations, users and collections will be permanently removed.

confirmDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete this site? All connections with organizations, users and collections will be permanently removed.

share.text: Check out a {{siteType}} site I found on Restor: {{siteName}}

embed.description1: Embedding a site involves copying the piece of code shown below and inserting it into your own web page. This allows you to display your Restor site within your own web page. <helpLink>Learn more</helpLink>.
embed.description2: Make sure your site is set to public. A private site can not be embedded.
embed.label: Embed code
